about_the_game:
"What could ever be better than this, in this world? Love is the most beautiful of all beautiful things, let me tell you. No, it is now possible to imagine anything more spicy, more enticing!" Lisidamus

Written by the famous Roman comedian Plauto in 184 BC, Casina was considered one the most famous and funny comedies in Ancient History. A blast from the past!

Features:

- Different endings (Good and Bad) + secondary dialogue choices.
- Fully Animated and professionally Voice Acted, complete with a unique character lip-syncing system.
- Multiple different Character Dynamic Expressions!
- 30+ CGS featuring Neoclassic Game's artworks.
- Full OST provided by the ever talented Vindsvept Fantasy Music.

Different main characters, different way of thinking.

Each one of our male character has his own way of managing things. What will be the right way to beat the others and conquer Casina? Who will manage to marry her?

Be careful of the others!

Watch your back! The other main character share your same goal so be aware of deceits and traps.

You are being watched...

Oh and of course, there are other ladies who will try to hamper the marriage in every way they can!

Our Cast!

reviews:
“Casina was a fun surprise produced by Neoclassic Games. They created this new version, produced with a good artistic and sound quality, featuring several comical and fun moments and making it a pleasant experience for all who wish to read this story.”
Nukige Nightclub - Witch Teacher

“Lovely idea to make an old theatrical play into a VN that I havent seen before. I also really appreciate the quality they put into it considering the price. Quite a unique experience overall.”
KittyVN
short_description: Want a good laugh? Well, in 184 BC Plautus wrote a play you will not easily forget! "Casina: the Forgotten Comedy" is a modern adaptation of his ancient work of literature, brought to you as a fully voiced and animated Visual Novel.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
